answers.answer: I think you should feel good about it too as they say preeclampsia can be dangerous for you both and baby sounds like a healthy weight already. Good luck for monday xx
I'm getting induced tomorrow night so I know how you feel lol good luck to you and your little one, keep us updated!
That's full term and healthy weight.  My water broke at 37 weeks to the day and baby was 8lb. 5oz. :) good luck Momma
Normal bp is 120/80. So yours isn't actually terrible. But yes preeclampsia can be dangerous. Good luck with your induction!
Its not terrible but i was averaging around 100-110/65-70 before being pregnant and earlier in pregnancy. So 148/88 is high for me.I also had +2 for protein.
Good luck! I'm being induced Monday too :)
Good luck! Just take this time to relax and prepare and to be excited!

question: Just got out of my doctor's and I'm being induced Monday. I'm 37w (to the day) and I have preeclampsia. My bp has been creeping up over the last 3 weeks and was 148/88 today at the office. I'm excited and nervous with a pinch of sheer panic.Baby weighs 7lbs 15oz. I feel good about this and trust my doctor.
title: Being Induced Monday
